author: Peter Goff
title: China reports zero new coronavirus deaths as positive trend continues
description: Authorities work to stave off second wave amid struggle with ongoing outbreaks in Wuhan
content: China reported zero new coronavirus deaths on Tuesday for the first time since it started publishing daily figures in January, a milestone that offers grounds for some relief as the country works to stave off a second wave and struggles with ongoing outbreaks… [+3111 chars]
